{{{
run:<tab name> // run the data from a tab as a script
clientConsole.setClient("<client name>"); // change the client to run against
}}}
{{clientConsole.clientAlias}} clijs><input type="text" of-id="clientConsole.cliText" size="120" onkeydown="if (event.keyCode == 13) clientConsole.runCli(); if (event.keyCode == 38) clientConsole.historyCli(-1); if (event.keyCode == 40) clientConsole.historyCli(+1);">
<button class="actionButton" onClick="clientConsole.runCli();" title="Run">[{Icon name="server go"}] Run</button><br/>
<button class="actionButton" onClick="clientConsole.clear();" title="Clear">[{Icon name="cross"}] Clear Log</button><br/>
{{clientConsole.text}}
